title: Can't see module menu with an unauthorized page error
content:
When you as a tenant admin or an agent user logs in to Service Management, you cannot see the menu items for all the modules (except the Administration > Configuration > Application Settings menu item). An "Unauthorized page" error message is displayed on UI.

Cause

This issue occurs because none of the experience modes is selected.

Solution

  1. Log in to Service Management as a tenant admin. 
  2. Go to Administration > Configuration > Application Settings.
  3. Select at least one experience mode and save the setting. For details, see Experience mode.
  4. Refresh the page and you should now see the menu items for modules.
